is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field><value name="VAL"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:RandomPotionEffect</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:time</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:strength</field><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">MobEffect effect;&#10;int random_number = new Random().nextInt(9);&#10;switch(random_number)&#10;{&#10;	default: case 0 : effect = MobEffects.MOVEMENT_SLOWDOWN; break;&#10;	case 1 : effect = MobEffects.DIG_SLOWDOWN; break;&#10;	case 2 : effect = MobEffects.CONFUSION; break;&#10;	case 3 : effect = MobEffects.BLINDNESS; break;&#10;	case 4 : effect = MobEffects.HUNGER; break;&#10;	case 5 : effect = MobEffects.WEAKNESS; break;&#10;	case 6 : effect = MobEffects.WITHER; break;&#10;	case 7 : effect = MobEffects.LEVITATION; break;&#10;	case 8 : effect = MobEffects.UNLUCK; break;&#10;}&#10;((LivingEntity) entity).addEffect(new MobEffectInstance(effect, (int)time, (int)strength));</field></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
